mapper.sql: id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, name_ch, name_en, pid, pic,pname
t.id, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.update_user, t.update_time, t.name_ch, t.name_en, t.pid, t.pic,t.pname
mapper.select: select , ifnull((SELECT name_ch FROM asset_type WHERE id = pid),'全部资产') pname from asset_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT , ifnull((SELECT name_ch FROM asset_type WHERE id = t.pid),'全部资产') pname FROM asset_type t
RIGHT JOIN asset t1 ON t1.type = t.id
ORDER BY t.id,LENGTH(t.id),t.id,LENGTH(t.id)

select
from asset_type where 1=1
AND id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from asset_type where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by LENGTH(id) desc, id desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into asset_type (id, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, name_ch, name_en, pid, pic) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nameCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update asset_type
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name_ch = #{nameCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update asset_type set create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name_ch = #{nameCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
